properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique string of numbers and letters that identifies the user on Pinterest.

properties.name: bio
properties.description: The text in the user’s “About you” section in their profile.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The date the user created their account in ISO 8601 format

properties.name: counts
properties.description: The user’s stats, including how many Pins, follows, boards and likes they have.

properties.name: image
properties.description: The user’s profile image. The response returns the image’s URL, width and height.
